source.author: Walsh, N.G.
source.title: Poaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 2. Ferns and Allied Plants, Conifers and Monocotyledons
source.citation: From: Walsh, N.G. (1994). Poaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 2. Ferns and Allied Plants, Conifers and Monocotyledons. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Glumes subequal, 1.8–3.3 mm long; inflorescence unbranched (rarely with a few branches up to 1 cm long in the lower part); lemmas closely overlapping, each more or less ovate when viewed from the side
Glumes unequal, the lower 1.3–2 mm, the upper 1.5–2.3 mm; inflorescence branched in lower half; lemmas loosely overlapping, more or less oblong when viewed from the side
